form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: Bank of America National Trust and Savings Association Letterhead, Form NARA 6/30/2023

full_text: Screened by NARA, 6/30/2023 Cable Address - BANKAMERICA Bank of America NATIONAL TAVINA'S ASSOCIATION ORANGE BRANCH . 345 CHAPMAN AVENUE ORANGE, CALIFORNIA 92666 March 15, 1967 United States Embassy Bombay, India Gentlemen: Dr. Rajendra G. Desai and Mrs. Pratima J. Desai have maintained accounts at this Bank for the past 22 months, maintaining a low three figure balance. At the present time, the combined balances in their accounts total approximately $3,500.00. According to records available to us, these customers have a net worth of approximately $76,000.00. We consider their honesty and integrity above reproach. Sincerely yours, O. Zippwald, Jr. Manager OZ :mem
